title: The Green Futures of Tycho
description: When eleven-year-old Tycho discovers that the mysterious egg-shaped object he dug up in his garden is a time travel device, he can't resist using his newfound power. Soon he is jumping back and forth in time, mostly to play tricks on his bossy older brothers and sister. But every time he uses the device, he notices that things are different when he gets backâ€”and the futures he visits are getting darker and scarier. Then Tycho comes face-to-face with the most terrible thing of his grown-up self. Can Tycho prevent the terrible future he sees from coming true?At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: William Sleator
